industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
Position: Replenishment Fulfillment Manager Location: Deerfield Beach, FL $120,000- $130,000 Salary Based On Experience Looking to HIRE RIGHT AWAY!!
Qualifications
  • Bachelors Degree in Business, Supply Chain or Related Field
  • 5+ Years of Replenishment and/or Inventory Planning, Transportation Planning, Fulfillment Management, S&OP Management, Demand Planning, Network Design Experience
  • Strong data analytics experience to analyze fulfillment metrics, identify trends to assess fulfillment performance and identify areas of improvement.


Job Summary:

The Replenishment/Fulfillment Manager will play a crucial role in ensuring that internal and external customers are supplied with the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for optimizing inventory levels, implementing effective replenishment strategies (including continuously reviewing the network design), and collaborating with various departments (Cement Plant, + 40 RMC and 6 Block plants, 4 Rail Terminals, Tampa Port, Sales Team, RMC Dispatch Team, Transportation Team), interface with carriers (+50 in Florida + FEC Rail) and suppliers (White Rock, Vulcan, Jahna, Cemex) to maximize operational efficiency. Additionally, will oversee our order fulfillment operations, ensuring efficient and accurate order processing and delivery (including Bulk Cement & Aggregates).

qualifications.required: Bachelors Degree in Business, Supply Chain or Related Field, 5+ Years of Replenishment and/or Inventory Planning, Transportation Planning, Fulfillment Management, S&OP Management, Demand Planning, Network Design Experience, Strong data analytics experience to analyze fulfillment metrics, identify trends to assess fulfillment performance and identify areas of improvement.

benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance, 401(k)
